SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.services

Klasse PostService

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.services.PostService
@Service public class PostService extends Object
This Service provides logic and usage for the Post repository. It provides methods for manipulating the data of these repositories.
Autor:
Lukas Burkhardt

  • Methodendetails

    • getPosts

      public List<Post> getPosts(Event event)
      Get all posts from the given event.
      Parameter:
      event - the event to get the posts from
      Gibt zurück:
      list of all posts

    • getPostById

      public Post getPostById(String postId)
      Returns the post with the given id. Throws an Exception if there is no post with the id.
      Parameter:
      postId - the id of the post to be returned
      Gibt zurück:
      the post

    • createPost

      public Post createPost(Post post)
      Creates the given post in the database.
      Parameter:
      post - the post to be created
      Gibt zurück:
      the created post

    • updatePost

      public Post updatePost(String postId, Post post)
      Overwrites the specified post with the given post object. Throws an Exception if there is no post with the specified id.
      Parameter:
      postId - the id of the post to overwrite
      post - the new post
      Gibt zurück:
      the overwritten post

    • createComment

      public Post createComment(Post post, PostComment comment)
      Creates a comment in the specified post.
      Parameter:
      post - the post to create the comment in
      comment - the comment to be created
      Gibt zurück:
      the post in which the comment was created
